definition: a flat thin rectangular slab (as of fired clay or rubber or linoleum) used to cover surfaces, cover with tiles
details:
noun
- a flat thin rectangular slab (as of fired clay or rubber or linoleum) used to cover surfaces
- game equipment consisting of a flat thin piece marked with characters and used in board games like Mah-Jong, Scrabble, etc.
- a thin flat slab of fired clay used for roofing
= synonyms: roofing tile
verb
- cover with tiles
= example: cover with tiles
